name: retransmit
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
media, internet & telecoms
  specialized to broadcast something, or to send out or carry signals or messages using radio, television, the internet, etc. again or to another person or group: Content may not be reproduced, redistributed, or retransmitted without the written permission of the publisher. The network is considering re-transmitting two foreign reality shows this summer. Related words
transmit (SEND OUT)
retransmission specialized
More examplesFewer examplesAll opinions reproduced or retransmitted on this website are solely the opinions of the author.TCP (or ''transmission control protocol'') is responsible for keeping track of what is sent, and retransmitting anything that did not get through.There are three cable TV networks, which retransmit the national TV channels.
